dialog.text: So yeah. . . I totally knew your plants would get root rot. I can’t believe you just kept watering them – you monster! Hahahahaha!
So here’s the deal. You have data. I want it. I infected your computer with a virus, and now everything on it belongs to me. Here is the other issue. . .
The infection seems to have developed a mind of its own, and I can’t control it. So we are going on a mission to regain control of your data.
I know, I know, why should you trust me? Look, I promise not to post your data to the dark web, but who knows what this entity will do!
Besides, you'd never win against the both of us...
